gud
portal gun is so cool

Finished the main story line in 3 hours. People surely can do faster than me because I'M REALLY BAD AT PUZZLE GAMES lol.

That being sad, the game is fricking amazing. Been waiting for years to play Valve's classic and I'm on a marathon. 

Overall gameplay is typical from source engine you might expect. The visual is still good for 2020 standards (Max Settings). Again, the game is pretty enjoyable. There ain't much story to tell in this game, everything is only implied. In the end of the day you really know nothing about what the hell had happened, but that, I supposed, is what made this game great. 

The puzzle itself is not that hard, my brain is literally Windows 95 to this Windows XP Sp2 puzzle--it ain't hard, just take your time and observe your surrounding and you'll be fine.

10/10 for me.
